turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I'm calling about my bill. I was charged $150 this month, but my usual plan is only $100. I'm really confused and a little frustrated because this has happened before.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Hello, I understand your frustration. I can definitely look into that for you. Can I please have your account number or the phone number associated with the account?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Okay, one moment while I access your account. ... Alright, I see here that there was an additional charge of $50 for exceeding your data limit. It appears you used 10GB of data over your allotted amount.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: That's ridiculous! I haven't changed my usage habits at all. How can I be suddenly using so much more data? Is there any way to get that charge waived? This is really upsetting, I'm considering switching providers.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I understand your concern. Let me check if there are any promotions or options to reduce your bill. ... Okay, I see that we can offer you a one-time credit of $25 towards the overage fee. Also, would you be interested in upgrading to a plan with more data to avoid future overage charges? We have a plan with 50% more data available for only $20 more per month.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hmm, okay, the $25 credit is helpful. I'm still annoyed about the extra charge, but I appreciate you finding a solution. I'll think about the plan upgrade. Thanks for your help!
